original_text: So think carefully about how Jesus lived on earth. Bad people did very bad things against him, but he continued to be strong. Think about him, and then you will not become weak as Christians. You will not stop trusting God.
korean_text: 너희가 피곤하여 낙심하지 않기 위하여 죄인들이 이같이 자기에게 거역한 일을 참으신 이를 생각하라

sentences.original_text: So think carefully about how Jesus lived on earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 예수께서 땅에서 어떻게 사셨는지 신중히 생각하십시오.

sentences.original_text: Bad people did very bad things against him,
sentences.korean_translation: 악한 사람들이 그에게 아주 나쁜 일들을 했지만,

sentences.original_text: but he continued to be strong.
and then you will not become weak as Christians.
You will not stop trusting God.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님을 신뢰하는 것을 멈추지 않을 것입니다.
